name: Time Cursed
description:
How long will you survive this time cursed hell ?

here, for one second everything pause and other it resumes, 

but not you ... You are UNSTOPPABLE ...

How to Play:

WASD - movement

Click to shoot

Credits:

Sound from:

Horror Ambience 25 - http://www.freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/

Heartbeat - https://freesound.org/people/mitchelk/sounds/136723/

Other: Using Bfxr

Font: 

Dogica byhttps://www.dafont.com/roberto-mocci.d8882?af=on

Source Code: https://github.com/gamedevshirious/Time-Cursed

This game was built during BYOG 2020 using theme 'One Second' 
The game becomes paused for one second and resumes normal for another...
